html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04582023-05-18GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Second Additional Protocol to the Convention on Cybercrime on enhanced co-operation and disclosure of electronic evidence
PrecisOrder authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the SECOND ADDITIONAL PROTOCOL TO THE CONVENTION ON CYBERCRIME on enhanced co-operation and disclosure of electronic evidence, adopted at Strasbourg on November 17, 2021; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Protocol.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Second Additional Protocol to the Convention on Cybercrime on enhanced co-operation and disclosure of electronic evidence
precis: Order authorizing (1) the Prime Minister or the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the SECOND ADDITIONAL PROTOCOL TO THE CONVENTION ON CYBERCRIME on enhanced co-operation and disclosure of electronic evidence, adopted at Strasbourg on November 17, 2021; or (2) the Minister of Foreign Affairs to execute and issue an Instrument of Full Powers, authorizing the individuals mentioned in the order, to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, subject to ratification, the Protocol.
